scripts.watch-server: cross-env DEV=1 nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node src
scripts.watch-server-proxied: cross-env FRONTEND_PROXY=3005 ADMIN_PROXY=3006 npm run watch-server
scripts.build-all: npm audit --omit=dev --audit-level=moderate && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run build-server && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin && echo COMPLETED
scripts.build-server: rm -rf dist/src dist/plugins && tsc --target es2018 && touch package.json && cp -v -r package.json central.json README* LICENSE* plugins dist && find dist -name .DS_Store -o -name storage -exec rm -rf {} + && node afterbuild.js
scripts.server-for-test-dev: cross-env DEV=1 FRONTEND_PROXY=3005 ADMIN_PROXY=3006 nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node src -- --cwd . --config tests
scripts.dist: npm run build-all && npm run dist-bin
scripts.dist-bin: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-win && npm run dist-bin-linux && npm run dist-bin-mac && npm run dist-bin-mac-arm
scripts.dist-modules: cp package*.json central.json dist && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev && cd .. && node prune_modules
scripts.dist-bin-win: npm run dist-pre && cd dist && npm i -f --no-save --omit=dev @node-rs/crc32-win32-x64-msvc && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node18-win-x64 && zip hfs-windows-x64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs.exe -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-mac-arm: npm run dist-pre && cd dist && npm i -f --no-save --omit=dev @node-rs/crc32-darwin-arm64 && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node18-macos-arm64 && zip hfs-mac-arm64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-mac: npm run dist-pre && cd dist && npm i -f --no-save --omit=dev @node-rs/crc32-darwin-x64 && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node18-macos-x64 && zip hfs-mac-x64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-linux: npm run dist-pre && cd dist && npm i -f --no-save --omit=dev @node-rs/crc32-linux-x64-gnu && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node18-linux-x64 && zip hfs-linux-x64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-win: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-win
scripts.dist-mac-arm: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-mac-arm
scripts.dist-mac: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-mac
scripts.dist-linux: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-linux
scripts.dist-node: npm run dist-modules && cd dist && zip hfs-node-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip -r * -x *.zip *.exe hfs-* *.log logs
